newsitem.title: SWITZERLAND: SBC to remain in retail banking - Ospel.
newsitem.headline: SBC to remain in retail banking - Ospel.

text.p: Swiss Bank Corp (SBC) intends to remain in the retail banking business, SBC chief executive Marcel Ospel said in a newspaper interview.
"An exit from or sale of this line of business is not an issue for us," Ospel said in an interview published in the Wednesday edition of the Swiss newspaper Handelszeitung.
He also said the retail banking business had become more attractive following cost cutting measures, he said.

In addition, Ospel said that for strategic reasons, SBC would not orient itself to only one or two key lines of business. He was responding to the question of whether SBC would rather concentrate on private or investment banking. -- Zurich Editorial +41 631 7340
